link.description: For more detailed discussions on NMR across the several task areas within NFDI4Chem, we invite you to join the “NMR Task Force Meeting”, taking place in Jena. We will cover having nmrXiv, embedding NMRium, as the open source choice for NMR platforms, along with other topics, which you can find in the agenda. Suggestions and edits to the agenda are welcome.
